imdb.title: Yoru no Yatterman
imdb.plot: Once upon a time, Yattarman who is a heroes of the justice. After having won the fight with Doronbo who is a gang of the evil, Yattarman established their country "Yattar-Kingdam". The present day, people in "Yattar-Kingdam" were ...

episodes.title: The World Is in Total Darkness
episodes.plot: Leopard is a descendent of Doronjo, who led a group of thieves called Doronbow. After coming to hold a grudge against Yatterman, she calls herself Doronjo and forms a new Doronbow, together with the descendents of Doronjo's underlings.

episodes.title: We'll Give Yatterman a Forehead Flicking
episodes.plot: After forming a new Doronbow, Doronjo, Boyacky and Tonzra finally enter Yatter Kingdom in order to give a forehead flicking to Yatterman. However, after the fight, they realize something that they had never even thought of.

episodes.title: We're Not Angels, But We'll Pretend to Be
episodes.plot: After being defeated by Yatter soldiers, Doronjo, Boyacky and Tonzra find a house to hide. There, they meet Alouette, who mistakes them for angels. She thinks that they are there to grant her wish to be reunited with her parents.

episodes.title: Steamy Outdoor Hot Spring Trip
episodes.plot: Doronjo and the gang come to know a couple when they stop by a village. When the wife goes to collect firewood, she offers to take them to a hot spring. Then, when they come back, they see her husband being taken away by the Yatter soldiers.

episodes.title: The Hurricane Dedicated to His Mother
episodes.plot: The gang come across a boy named Takeshi who enters himself and Galina into a sumo tournament. After some intense training, the two inevitably face off against each other in the semi-finals

episodes.title: The Flower That Blooms in Winter
episodes.plot: With the gang constantly being pursued by Goro, Leopard gets upset when Voltkatze and Elephantus tell her to give up on pursuing the Yattermen and goes off on her own, only to be chased by Yatter Soldiers

episodes.title: Ocean of Dreams
episodes.plot: Delirious from hunger after days without food, the gang come across a masochistic fisherman named Ryu, who they initially believe to be a turtle that would take them to the Sea God's Palace like in the legend of Urashima Taro.

episodes.title: Kusshi of Lake Kussharo Dessharo
episodes.plot: While treating Leopard as she comes down with a fever, Galina tells her about Allouette's father, Gorozo, who entrusted him with Allouette's protection, while Leopard seems to develop feelings for him.

episodes.title: Abareshi, No Address
episodes.plot: Down to his last chance, Goro manages to capture Leopard, Voltkatze, and Elephantus and takes them to Abareshi Prison, an allegedly inescapable place.

episodes.title: Surrounded by the Twelve Divine Yatter Generals
episodes.plot: On their way towards the tower in the center of Yatter Metropolis, where they believe Yatterman to be hiding, the gang survey the factories people are being forced to work in

episodes.title: The Truth About Yatter Metropolis
episodes.plot: Dokurobey explains how many years ago, he and the original Doronbow Gang fought against the original Yattermen in order to reclaim the Dokuro Stones that made up his body.

episodes.title: Daybreak
episodes.plot: Feeling they cannot defeat Dokurobey on their own, Leopard and the others try to spread the word that Yatterman is actually Dokurobey, albeit to no avail. Believing the people will listen to Yatterman, Galina suggests that he and Allouette take on the role of Yatterman themselves.
